content.html: Not the Nigerians in Ukraine not being able to get through the border into Poland because they are being turned around after being told "Ukrainians first." Antiblackness even in the face of fucking war.
content.value:
Not the Nigerians in Ukraine not being able to get through the border into Poland because they are being turned around after being told "Ukrainians first."
 
Antiblackness even in the face of fucking war.
